item.title: Golden Week
item.content:encoded:
Golden Week in Japanâ€‹

In Japan, between April and May, We celebrate Independence Day, Green Day, and Children's Day. Along with the weekend, we have five national holidays.

This year, the weather is cooler than other years. I spent time traveling with my wife. We went to Enoshima together. We eat fresh seafood and enjoy life beside the long beach.

I also played soccer with some friends and it was a great time. We were all really into the game, and it was a close match. But in the end, I managed to cross some people and score the winning goal! It was so exciting, and we all celebrated together.

In my 9th year in Japan, my wife and I have a much better life than before. Hope you all had a nice holiday too.

item.title: The-Weekend
item.description: I want to share my favorite a bit. I like biking, and this season is a nice time to ride out on my cycle.
item.content:encoded:
I want to share my favorite a bit. I like biking, and this season is a nice time to ride out on my cycle.

This is my road bike, I bought it 2 years ago when I came to Kasai - Edogawaku - Tokyo.

After that, I bought more helmets, clothes, sunglasses, and cycling shoes. It cost about 300usd but gives me a sense of security when running long distances.

And this is my road today. I ran from Kasai to Akabane and go back. The distance was about 60km and I ran for 2 hours.

Go to AkabaneCome back home

I was surprised a bit when I saw my max speed today. It's 52km/h, It's really fast, I think so!

And finally, when I came back home, I took some photos by the Ara River.

That's my weekend, How about your weekend?
